message.content:
I need to identify the line item related to the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see the following line items:
- Main Business Revenue
- Total Revenue
- Cost of Goods Sold
- Total Cost
- Gross Profit
- Administrative Expenses
- Selling Expenses
- Depreciation
- Financial Expenses
- Total Expenses
- Interest Income
- Profit Before Tax
- Tax Expense
- Net Profit

The line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life is "Depreciation" with a value of 91503.06.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91503.06'}}
```
